name: Mom Is Not Home
description:
Your mother leaves to buy groceries in the middle of the night. You stay alone at home. You are happy you can enjoy alone by yourself but soon you wish you're mother was there.

A game made in 1 week.

credits:

Programming - Omogonix, Oaklytical, HistorVical
